title: France panorama. [No. 73/12]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. After elections - renewing the National Assembly. 2. Unusual arts: Science, forms and colors - exhibition at the National Space Research Bureau. Fossils - fossils as objects d’art. 3. Anti-noise research - study and research to reduce jet-engine noise. 4. 20 books in 20 years - Pierre Lecuire and his art books.
